name: Petfinder Search
description: A pretty wrapper/caching layer for the Petfinder API

PETFINDER_SHELTER_IDS.description: A comma seperated list (no spaces) of shelter ids from Petfinder.

PETFINDER_DEFAULT_PHOTO_URL.description: A url for the default image to be displayed in the case that the animal in question doesn't have a photo in Petfinder.
